query:
SELECT
                mc.person_tmdb_id,
                mc.credit_id,
                mc.cast_id,
                COALESCE(mc.character, '') AS "character!",
                mc.order_index,
                p.name,
                p.original_name,
                p.profile_path,
                p.gender,
                p.known_for_department,
                p.adult,
                p.popularity,
                p.imdb_id,
                p.facebook_id,
                p.instagram_id,
                p.twitter_id,
                p.wikidata_id,
                p.tiktok_id,
                p.youtube_id,
                COALESCE(alias_data.aliases, ARRAY[]::TEXT[]) AS "aliases!: Vec<String>"
            FROM movie_cast mc
            JOIN persons p ON p.tmdb_id = mc.person_tmdb_id
            LEFT JOIN (
                SELECT tmdb_id, ARRAY_AGG(alias ORDER BY alias) AS aliases
                FROM person_aliases
                GROUP BY tmdb_id
            ) alias_data ON alias_data.tmdb_id = mc.person_tmdb_id
            WHERE mc.movie_id = $1
            ORDER BY mc.order_index
